author: WULFF DEN
description:
Use code YAHUNGRYFB50 to get 50% OFF your first Factor box plus free breakfast for 1 year at https://bit.ly/4lbKldu

These controllers both have macro functionality. The Pokémon community has started using the 8bitdo Pro 3 to shiny hunt for them, but the Gulikit KK3 Max also has a great macro function that might be better for even more use cases. Don't worry, both work just fine on the Nintendo Switch 2.

The @PhillyBeatzU Excel Spreadsheet https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vtvvjHf6XjoNOOor79sGWcAb-7cODfC4MxtP7dGHp2c/edit?usp=sharing

title: Pokémon players are using these controllers to play the game for them
